questions.quote: Well, after he heckled Toby, she got so upset, she ran out of the building and a street sweeper ran over her foot and severed her pinky toe.
All right. Well, I'll see ya. Hey, George, I think there's a sniper lookin' to pop ya.
So, to what do I owe the pleasure of this, unannounced, visit?
Yes, I called you, you idiot! Because you were going to... You were going to... Remember?
hey you know it's weird because that voice sounded a little familiar to me
Why? Why would that one area of his mind not be affected by the yellow sun of Earth?
Oh, that's just Jane driving home to New York in the middle of the night.
Would you shut up? These are great! You can't get any better than this.
All right, I'll do it.  Hey kids. What's the deal with homework? you're not working on your home!
Well, you know Jake, you should learn to use them. Like the way I'm talking right now, I would put an exclamation points at the end of all these sentences! On this one! And on that one!
